name: Vodalian War Machine
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Tap an untapped Merfolk you control: Vodalian War Machine can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
Tap an untapped Merfolk you control: Vodalian War Machine gets +2/+1 until end of turn.
When Vodalian War Machine dies, destroy all Merfolk tapped this turn to pay for its abilities.

name: Vodalian Zombie
text: Protection from green

editions.flavor:
"Every last one of you will become my servant. It's a shame you won't live to see the irony."
—Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

name: Voiceless Spirit
text: Flying, first strike

editions.flavor:
"I'd rather take on a neckbiter or moonhowler any day. Oh well, looks like I'm going to end up parrying with empty air half the night."
—Saint Trogen, the Slayer

name: Voice of All
text:
Flying
As Voice of All enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Voice of All has protection from the chosen color.

name: Voice of Duty
text: Flying, protection from green

editions.flavor:
"Next to Law is Duty, and Duty must be obeyed. If the frame of Duty is broken, none shall weave life's fabric."
—Song of All, canto 167

name: Voice of Grace
text: Flying, protection from black

editions.flavor:
"Opposite Law is Grace, and Grace must be preserved. If the strands of Grace are unraveled, its design will be lost, and the people with it."
—Song of All, canto 167

name: Voice of Law
text: Flying, protection from red

editions.flavor:
"Life's balance is as a star: on one point is Law, and Law must be upheld. If the knots of order are loosened, chaos will spill through."
—Song of All, canto 167

name: Voice of Reason
text: Flying, protection from blue

editions.flavor:
"Next to Grace is Reason, and Reason must be retained. If the web of Reason comes unwoven, madness will escape."
—Song of All, canto 167

name: Voice of Resurgence
text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell during your turn or when Voice of Resurgence dies, create a green and white Elemental creature token with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control."

name: Voice of the Provinces
text:
Flying
When Voice of the Provinces enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.

editions.flavor: Her horn is heard across Innistrad, lifting the hearts of the righteous.
Her horn is heard across Innistrad, lifting the hearts of the righteous.

name: Voice of the Woods
text: Tap five untapped Elves you control: Create a 7/7 green Elemental creature token with trample.

editions.flavor: The ritual of making draws upon the elves' memories and pasts. And elves have long memories and ancient pasts.

editions.set: Duel Decks Anthology, Elves vs. Goblins
editions.flavor: The ritual of making draws upon the elves' memories and pasts. And elves have long memories and ancient pasts.

text: Flying, protection from white

editions.flavor:
"Above them all is Truth, and Truth must be set free. If the wings of Truth are clipped, the voices will fall silent."
—Song of All, canto 167

name: Voices from the Void
text: Domain — Target player discards a card for each basic land type among lands you control.

editions.flavor: As Grixis collided with the rest of Alara, the worlds began to hear the hateful whispers of the forgotten dead.

name: Void
text: Choose a number. Destroy all artifacts and creatures with converted mana cost equal to that number. Then target player reveals his or her hand and discards all nonland cards with converted mana cost equal to the number.

name: Void Attendant
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
{1}{G}, Put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard: Create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

editions.flavor: The Eldrazi don't merely extinguish life—they supplant it.

name: Void Grafter
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

editions.flavor: Eldrazi break concentration like glass.

text: Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

editions.flavor:
"It is technically an ooze, but its lifespan measures only seconds. In that short time, its appetite for magic is extraordinary."
—Simic research notes

text:
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

Flying

editions.flavor:

Enchant creature

text: Destroy target land.

text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Volcanic Vision deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to each creature your opponents control. Exile Volcanic Vision.

text:
Flying
{1}{R}: Volcano Imp gains first strike until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Its claws cut faster than a flame flickers.

Haste

Enchant permanent

name: Volrath
text: Whenever a creature you control is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may put it on top of your library.

editions.flavor: The son of Gerrard's surrogate father, Sidar Kondo, Volrath stole Gerrard's Legacy and rose to power selling it off piece by piece. Now, he is an evincar, or agent, of the Lord of the Wastes. Armed with exceptional magical powers, he plots to conquer the entire multiverse.

name: Volrath's Curse
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. That creature's controller may sacrifice a permanent for that player to ignore this effect until end of turn.
{1}{U}: Return Volrath's Curse to its owner's hand.

name: Volrath's Dungeon
text:
Pay 5 life: Destroy Volrath's Dungeon. Any player may activate this ability but only during his or her turn.
Discard a card: Target player puts a card from his or her hand on top of his or her library. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: Volrath's Gardens
text: {2}, Tap an untapped creature you control: You gain 2 life. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

editions.flavor: "Watch yourself," warned Starke. "These plants aren't nice when they're hungry."

text:

{5}, {T}: Create a 2/2 creature token of the chosen color and type.

If Volrath's Motion Sensor falls off the hand, sacrifice Volrath's Motion Sensor and that player loses 3 life.

text:

{2}: Discard a card.

text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{1}{B}, {T}: Put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.

editions.flavor: The seed of a world's evil.

text: {1}{B}, Discard a creature card: Volrath the Fallen gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the discarded card's converted mana cost.

editions.flavor: "I stepped out. I did not step down."

text:

text: {2}: Untap target artifact creature.

The key did not work on a single lock, yet it opened many doors.

text: Volt Charge deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

editions.flavor: After making the Peach Garden Oath, the three brothers raised an army of 500 youths to fight the Yellow Scarves rebellion.
People fight hardest on their own soil.

name: Volunteer Reserves
text:
Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. "I'm always a little leery of anyone who offers to kill other people for free."

First strike
